verses.verse: And <WG2532> the fifth <WG3991> angel <WG32> sounded <WG4537> <WG5656>, and <WG2532> I saw <WG1492> <WG5627> a star <WG792> fall <WG4098> <WG5761> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772> unto <WG1519> the earth <WG1093>: and <WG2532> to him <WG846> was given <WG1325> <WG5681> the key <WG2807> of the bottomless <WG12> pit <WG5421>.
